DOC.brief_summary: To survey patient rosacea rosacea treatment preference well assess potential driver rosacea treatment satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: Preferences & Treatment Satisfaction Drivers Rosacea Patients
DOC.criteria: Male female patient least 18 year age index date At least one prescription topical rosacea treatment : Azelaic Acid Gel , Azelaic Acid Cream , Metronidazole Gel , Metronidazole Cream , Metronidazole Emulsion , Metronidazole Lotion , Brimonidine Tartrate Gel At least one medical record diagnosis code rosacea ( ICD9 : 695.3 ) At least 6 month data history prior index date Had least one encounter Reliant Medical Group within 3 month prior 01 January 2015
